title: Jennifer Lopez, 50, flaunts her age-defying figure in Alexander Wang
text:
She turned 50 in July.

But Jennifer Lopez wound back the clock on Saturday, when the Hustlers star took daughter Emme out for a New York City shopping trip while decked out in Alexander Wang.

JLo insulated herself on the cool Fall day in a blue sweater bearing the letters 'wang' across the front.

Still got it: Jennifer Lopez wound back the clock on Saturday, when the Hustlers star took daughter Emme out for a New York City shopping trip while decked out in Alexander Wang

The Jenny from the Block songstress showcased her famous booty in a pair of glittery blue leggings.

On her feet, the mother-of-two wore a pair of fur lined black leather boots.

Her brunette tresses were piled atop her head in a tight bun, and she shielded her eyes behind a pair of oversized shades for the outing.

The look: JLo insulated herself on the cool Fall day in a blue sweater bearing the letters 'wang' across the front

Both sides now: The Jenny from the Block songstress showcased her famous booty in a pair of glittery blue leggings

The daughter Jennifer shares with ex-husband Marc Anthony wore ripped blue jeans with an oversize blue T-shirt.

The shirt bore X-ray images of skateboarding skeletons.

Lopez also shares son Max, 11, with Marc, who happens to be the top selling tropical salsa artist of all time.

Future's so bright: Her brunette tresses were piled atop her head in a tight bun, and she shielded her eyes behind a pair of oversized shades for the outing

Jennifer is in the midst of wedding preparations with retired pro baseball player fiance, Alex Rodriguez.

Rodriquez popped the question to his bride-to-be over a romantic getaway to the Bahamas in March after over two years of dating.

The Love Don't Cost A Thing hitmaker has been previously married three times - Cuban actor Ojani Noa from 1997 to 1998, choreographer Chris Judd from 2001 to 2003, and singer Anthony, with who she shares twins Emme and Max, 11, from 2004 to 2014.

She was briefly engaged to Ben Affleck and had a high-profile romance with P. Diddy.

Emme: The daughter Jennifer shares with ex-husband Marc Anthony wore ripped blue jeans with an oversize blue T-shirt
description: Jennifer Lopez wound back the clock on Saturday, when the Hustlers star took daughter Emme out for a New York City shopping trip while decked out in Alexander Wang.
